attributes.action: urgently review a grotesquely inadequate, totally UNFIT FOR PURPOSE, POLICE SERVICE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Police service in the UK no longer exsists - it was the general public whom found the recent car bombs in London and the Police will not be there when you need them. 
And the 24 hour police station will not be open - despite their blatantly dishonest claims to the contrary.
